TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class XmlnsCompatibleWithAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Especifica que um namespace de XAML pode ser incluído em outro namespace de XAML.

span.span: Specifies that a XAML namespace can be subsumed by another XAML namespace.

summary.span: Normalmente, o namespace de XAML incluído é indicado em um definido anteriormente.

span.span: Typically, the subsuming XAML namespace is indicated in a previously defined .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Aplicar o permite que um assembly fornecer um namespace novo e compatível para outro namespace XAML, como indicado pelo .Applying the enables an assembly to provide a new and compatible namespace for another XAML namespace, as previously indicated by . Por exemplo, `"http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls"` pode ser marcado como compatível com um namespace XAML definido identificado como `"http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls"` por meio dos seguintes atributos de nível de assembly:For example, `"http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls"` could be marked compatible with a defined XAML namespace identified as `"http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls"` through the following assembly-level attributes: ``` [assembly:System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsDefinition("http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls", "Adatum.Controls")] [assembly: System.Windows.Markup.XmlnsCompatibleWith("http://www.adatum.com/2003/controls", "http://www.adatum.com/2005/controls")] ``` Nas versões anteriores do .NET Framework, essa classe existia no assembly específicos de WPF WindowsBase.In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. Em [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], está no assembly System. XAML.In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. Para obter mais informações, consulte [tipos migrados do WPF para System. XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
